cast.name: 阿娣提·拉奥·希达里 Aditi Rao Hydari
塔哈·沙·巴德沙 Taha Shah Badussha

trans_title: 泰姬陵：血缘之战  第一季
introduction: Follows the dark side of the story of the Mughal empire and its emperors.Taj is an episodic series based on the life and times of the Mughal Dynasty. It is a multiple-episode per season show, run over six seasons, dramatizing the rise and fall of the various generations of the Mughal Empire. Every facet of the show brings out the contrasts inherent in that era, pitting: Lavish luxury against gritty consequences. Passionate love stories against cold treachery. Peaceful philosophies against fundamental beliefs. Innocent beginnings against desperate endings. It takes viewers on a historic journey showing them an unseen perspective of this illustrious dynasty which led to its rise as the greatest empire in medieval times and the quest for power within it, finally led to its downfall.
chinese_title: 泰姬陵：血缘之战  第一季
